questions.name: Do you have mild or moderate acne?
Are you female and between 18 and 55?
Are you allergic to any of the following: Adapalene, Azelaic Acid, Benzoyl Peroxide, Clindamycin
Are you pregnant, planning on becoming pregnant, or breastfeeding?
Do you understand that it can take 4-8 weeks of treatment before beneficial effects are seen?
